title: ‘Top Chef: Portland’ Episode 2 Recap and a Phoebe Waller-Bridge Update
description:
Phoebe Waller-Bridge will star in the fifth Indiana Jones film; Chris and Andy discuss her rapid success and what she's accomplished over the years. Then, they are joined by Mina Kimes to talk through 'Top Chef: Portland' Episode 2. They discuss cooking with friends (12:20), their favorite go-to diner order (22:35), and the early elimination of a favorite contestant (49:20). Plus, their big board draft picks (52:10)!

Hosts: Chris Ryan and Andy Greenwald

Guest: Mina Kimes
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
